restaurants.description: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. restaurants.name: Tempo Gelato
restaurants.description: Tempo Gelato is the most sought after ice cream shop in Gudeg City. Currently Tempo Gelato is located in 3 different locations, namely Taman Siswa, Prawirotaman, and Jalan Kaliurang. In this place there are many variants of ice cream ranging from fruits, spices and even sorbet. Tempo Gelato, which is located in the Student City, was first established in 2015 on Jalan Prawirotaman, Yogyakarta. Over time, they expanded the branch by opening two other places in Taman Siswa and on Jalan Kaliurang. Gelato sold in other shops usually offers common flavors such as chocolate, strawberry, vanilla or green tea. However, at Tempo Gelato Yogyakarta you can find many different flavors that are unique and contemporary. Unmitigated, the number reaches 50 flavors, guys! For example, the taste of fruits such as lychee, melon, mango, strawberry and other fruit flavors. Or the taste of spices, namely ginger, basil and even a spicy chocolate flavor. In addition to these two types, Tempo Gelato also provides unique and contemporary flavors such as Mint, Oreo and Kit-Kat. Various price packages are provided at Tempo Gelato, starting from 25 thousand Rupiah, you can already get two flavors of gelato with a small cup. However, if you're not satisfied with just two flavors, you can buy a medium cup that can choose up to three flavors, or a big cup that can choose four flavors and also an X-Big cup with five flavors. The building at Tempo Gelato is very unique because it has a blend of Javanese and Italian nuances. Some people here not only enjoy gelato, but also don't want to miss taking pictures. In fact, the artist Bryan Domani also posed for fun when he visited this place.

restaurants.name: Saboten
restaurants.description: Saboten Shokudo is a culinary location that serves various variants of Japanese cuisine as its main dish. Saboten Shokudo presents halal Japanese cuisine at affordable prices, and has been adapted according to local or fusion tastes. Saboten comes from Japanese which means cactus tree and shokudo means restaurant. Having a philosophical meaning, Saboten Shokudo is expected to be a strong restaurant and able to survive in various circumstances. Currently, Saboten Shokudo has 4 outlets. Many variants of Japanese cuisine are presented, ranging from donburi, katsu, sukiyaki, to yakiniku. Some of the most popular and ordered menus by visitors include Yakiniku, Sukiyaki, Chicken Katsu BBQ, and Spicy Chicken Ramen.

restaurants.name: Barn Event Hire
restaurants.description: Barn Event Hire Surabaya is actually an open space with a rustic concept to hold wedding and pre-wedding events. It is part of the Rustic Market which has various facilities such as a Coffee Shop, Unique Store, venue tents, halls and so on. The total area is 4,500 square meters. Now for this review, we limit it to the cafe or coffee shop. Curious as to what the place is and what menus are offered? Check out the full info below. Besides our city, it feels like this new cafe hire event shouldn't be missed when you come to Surabaya. A cafe that is again hype with a rustic concept. The area of ​​the cafe itself is not too big, it's at the back of the Barn Event hire. So at the front, you will find an area for weddings and pre-wedding, you just have to walk straight to the back. Later there is a building with a fairly small size. Although small, but interestingly there are smoking and non-smoking areas. Besides that, every corner looks instagramable with all the decorative knick-knacks. Don't be surprised if there, almost everyone is busy taking photos here and there. However, it should be noted that visitors are not allowed to bring DSLR cameras with only cellphone cameras. And those who are allowed to take photos are only in the cafe section, besides that it is indeed rented out for events and pre-wedding. The hommy atmosphere and the ambiance will make you feel at home for a long time.

restaurants.name: The Sayan House
restaurants.description: This beautiful dining area which is directly facing the Ayung River is quite famous as a location for holding private events or receptions. Want to feel like you are on top of the world? Immediately visit The Sayan House. The Sayan House is the best place to be at one with nature. From the view of the forest, green rice fields and water flowing fast in the Ayung River, you can all see it here. Enjoy a romantic dinner with loved ones while watching the beautiful sunset behind the hill. Or install lights on the trees to create a fairy tale wedding atmosphere. In terms of food, The Sayan House serves a variety of contemporary menus as well as Asian-flavored dishes that are certainly delicious. Try their Crispy King Prawn & Avocado Maki as well as their Salmon Carpaccio! There are also unique menus such as Babi Guling Sushi. If you like trying new foods, you won't be disappointed here.

restaurants.name: Sydwic
restaurants.description: Sydwic is a cafe located at Jalan Cilaki No. 63, Citarum, Bandung. This cafe has a unique interior concept and looks comfortable and charming. Thick with shades of black, white, and brown, Sydwic is often used as a hangout to style with outfits of the day. The menu offered at this café is also suitable for the tongue of Indonesians in general. Most of the existing culinary is typical Indonesian cuisine and Western food. For those who have never been to Sydwic, you can try its flagship menu, namely Spaghetti combined with shrimp and sambal matah. For drinks, Sydwic also has many menu options to choose from. However, the most popular is a drink called eskosu, which is an abbreviation of the refreshing iced coffee milk drink. All menus at Sydwic have quite affordable prices, which are in the range of 25 thousand to 59 thousand Rupiah. No need to be confused about finding time to hang out at this cafe. The reason is, Sydwic starts to open from 7 am to 11 pm. So, you can freely find free time to get together with close friends at this unique cafe.

restaurants.name: Kampung Laut
restaurants.description: The floating restaurant Kampung Laut Semarang is located at Puri Maerokoco Tawang Mas, Jalan Anjasmoro Raya, West Semarang, Tawangsari, Semarang, Semarang City, Central Java 50144. It takes about 15-20 minutes from the Novotel Hotel, which is on Jl. Youth to reach the Kampung Laut Resto located in Tawang Mas. This Kampung Laut restaurant has a large area of ​​land and is located on the edge of a lake. At the entrance, on the wooden wall there are writings of various menus. Here, visitors will not find buildings with cement walls, the existing buildings are dominated by wood. To enjoy food with a natural feel, there are several platforms overlooking the lake, and thatched-roof dining huts. Some of the facilities and things that visitors can enjoy at Kampung Laut Semarang are that there is a wooden bridge about 100 m long that looks quite sturdy, there is a prayer room, children's playground and fishing grounds. Kampung Laut is able to accommodate large numbers of visitors for various events. There is a customer service desk with staff ready to serve guests, as well as fairly complete office equipment and scattered promotional materials. Kampung Laut can serve group reservations with a minimum number of 50 people and can order buffet packages at special prices, with prices starting from IDR 55,000 per person to IDR 110,000 per person. The menu is presented with the type of food and also the number of menu dishes that are adjusted to the price. Favorite places that are usually ordered by groups are tables by the lake, which provide separate seating, so they don't disturb and be disturbed by other guests, also because the location is more protruding into the lake, it becomes more private. The restaurant's opening hours are daily from 11.30 to 22.00. But on Sundays, the restaurant is open from 10.00 and closes at 22.30

restaurants.name: The Hills Dining
restaurants.description: The Hills Dining Restaurant is one of the restaurants on the hill which is very suitable as a place to enjoy the sunset while eating a variety of delicious dishes. This dining restaurant has a varied menu, which is a combination of western and Indonesian food. The food and drink menu offered by The Hills Semarang is able to make anyone feel hypnotized because it is delicious. Of the many food menus at The Hills, you should try one of the signature dishes here, Long Horn. Long Horn is a roast beef dish that reaches 75 cm in length.

restaurants.name: Kolamkita
restaurants.description: Not far from the T-junction of the Barong Statue, Kemiren Village, there is a family restaurant which is also unique. The Kita Resto pool has several huts built on top of a fish pond. Here visitors can spend time waiting for orders to come by fishing. Later, the fish from the bait can be taken home or directly processed into a delicious dish. With a specialty in carp, this restaurant, which opens on D+2 Lebaran, is a perfect place for families to relax. If you stop by here, try the grilled shrimp menu. Shrimp of medium size, grilled with honey. The sweet taste of honey is so delicious mixed with the savory and sweetness of the fresh prawn meat. The price of food here ranges from 4 thousand to 35 thousand Rupiah.

restaurants.name: Hedon Cafe
restaurants.description: This cafe itself is located in front of the Penataban Banyuwangi gas station. The theme of the cafe, which prioritizes the exclusivity of the middle up, is really applied in every corner of the interior of this Hedon cafe. In the front yard of the cafe, lined with silver lamborghini cars with luxurious gold plates. The inside of the cafe is also lined with cars with fantastic prices and don't miss the magnificent Harley-Davidson motorcycle. This Hedon consists of 3 floors, where the first floor is devoted to a casual cafe, the second floor is for a restaurant, and the third floor has a spacious hall suitable for office meetings or parties with family and friends. On the third floor is also equipped with a mini stage for live music and there are also gold nuanced gamelan instruments. It's not enough to get here, this cafe and restaurant also has a large backyard and is equipped with a gazebo, for those of you who want to hold a garden party-themed wedding, this is perfect here. As the name suggests, the prices for food and drinks at this cafe are quite pricey. This is because this cafe also collaborates with a well-known coffee brand, Excelso, so it's only natural that they set a fairly high price. The target market for this cafe is also the middle-up people of Banyuwangi and its surroundings. Do you like playing billiards? The cafe also has a billiards place
